Name: Virgin Galactic: The First Ten Years (Springer Praxis Books)

ReviewList.Text: Everything you need to know about how Virgin Galactic are developing the suborbital space business, written by Norway's most prolific non-fiction author. This book also includes details of the tragic accident in 2014 and describes how Virgin Galactic will recover following the construction of the second SpaceShipTwo. Another great read from Dr Seedhouse.
As I bought my Virgin flight back in 2007,I get as much info as possible on the subject.This is an excellent look at the company's highs and lows since its formation,covers just about everything.
